subject: Add Fund detail page and enhance Dashboard
body:
- Create FundDetailPage component at /funds/:fundCode with full fund
  info, NAV display, balance, chart placeholder, and buy/sell buttons
- Rewrite DashboardPage with portfolio overview: total value header,
  quick actions card, fund holdings list, and crypto holdings list
- Make FundCard header clickable to navigate to fund detail page
- Add route for fund detail page in App.tsx
- Add translation keys for new Dashboard and fund detail features
- Update documentation with completed tasks

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add Fund detail page and enhance Dashboard
